summary: REQ-2 (frontend startup recovery with auto retry/backoff and retry re-init) appears implemented via new startup gate logic and safe actor initialization with retries/timeouts. REQ-1 (backend healthCheck reliability / clean rebuild) is partially evidenced by a healthCheck() returning true, but the diff does not provide enough evidence about clean redeploy/state reset behavior. Several UI/theme and navigation changes appear unrelated to the request and include a Settings page theme change that conflicts with stated non-goals.

hallucinated_features.description: Changed Settings page styling/theme (gold + black theme matching Dashboard styling).
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states a non-goal: "Do not change the Settings page styling/theme as part of this rebuild request." The diff summary indicates SettingsPage styling/theme was changed.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/pages/SettingsPage.tsx": "Settings page with gold + black theme matching Dashboard styling...")

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced a new `.unauth-theme` wrapper and gold accent theme tokens for unauthenticated/startup gating screens.
hallucinated_features.reason: The request focuses on startup recovery behavior (retry/backoff, re-init without reload) and does not request theme/token changes.
evidence: frontend/src/app/AuthenticatedApp.tsx (wraps startup states in `unauth-theme` and mentions gold accent theme in comment)
frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/index.css": "new `.unauth-theme` wrapper class that overrides ... tokens to gold")

hallucinated_features.description: Added/modified navigation and layout UI features (e.g., new "About Me" nav entry; logo loading resilience changes) not requested by the rebuild/retry requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest requirements only cover backend canister reliability and frontend startup retry behavior; navigation/menu/logo feature work is out of scope.
